hymn.title: What mercy that my eyes have seen the true God

layout.singingstanza: What mer -- cy that my eyes have seen the true God, Hap -- p'ly trans -- ferred from dark -- ness in -- to light! What grace that I can free -- ly have sal -- va -- tion, No need to work, en -- deav -- or with my might!

lyrics.stanza: What mercy that my eyes have seen the true God, Happily transferred from darkness into light! What grace that I can freely have salvation, No need to work, endeavor with my might!
Now that I'm saved, remember, Lord, my family, Their sins You've borne, the way has thus been paved; This day fulfill the promise You have given: "Believe in Christ; your whole house shall be saved."
Lord, hear my prayer and gain all in my family! My heart is burning with this vow to You: "I and my house will serve the Lord forever!" We'll worship God for He alone is true!
